resources.string: Very versatile Operater, good for any map.
Roaming Operater, flanks later in the round.
Healer, can frag and keep teammates alive.
Good for electrifying hatches on Church and Armory.
Entry denial Operator, good for stopping rushes.
Flex Operater, great for playing Cash and CCTV.
Hard Breacher, Good for getting into site.
Hands down the best Operater for attacking.
Hard Breacher, better for Armory and Church.
Intel Operater, good for seeing enemy positions.
Second best Operater for any map.
Hard Breacher, good for any situation.
Fragging Operater, has a shield in front of his face.
Fragging Intel Operater, good for finding roamers.
Healer Fragger Operater, good for making pushes.
Cash and CCTV, the easiest site to defend.
Church and Armory, the second best site to defend.
Clubhouse Gym and Bedroom Site, play this site last.
ACOG, gives you a 2.5x zoom to hold longer angles, use this one when available.
Holo, no zoom multiplier, but it has the cleanest crosshair, the acog alternative.
Reflex, just a green triangle, avoid using.
Red Dot, just a red dot, avoid using.
